author: markt
msg: Treat a context path of "/ROOT" as equivalent to "" (i.e. it is treated as the ROOT application).

Note that when deploying an application via the manager text interface to /ROOT, it was deployed as the ROOT application but reported that the deployment had failed. It now deploys it as the ROOT application and reports a successful deployment to the context path "/"

author: gsim
msg: QPID-5457: support for messages composed of multiple transfers

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-4906, LUCENE-5376: using the expert 'render to Object' APIs in PostingsHighlighter to render directly to JSONArray in lucene server

author: markt
msg: Clarify that Container elements may only no more than one Realm.
